ee anuwa apa aayathanaya wisin sidukerunu paryeshana osse, gowi prajawa athara jalaya bediyame samanathawaya, handunwa dun nawa jala kalamanakarana widi mangin waga thiwrarathawayata ha jala paladayithawayata siduwanna wu balapam, ewani krama magin siduwanna wu jala ithuruwa, gowin ee kerehi dakwana ladiyawa ema kramawala wasi awasi wimasima sidukerini.ee anuwa, ‚Äòmahawali ech kalapaye jala pangu kramaya pilibanda thakseru kirima‚Äô, ‚Äòshrii lankawa thula wiwidha ansha kere jalaya bedi yama adhyayanaya‚Äô, ‚Äòaayathanika mattame wasi diya ekras kirima pilibanda aarthika wimasuma‚Äô, ‚Äòwarimarga kalamanakaranaya thula rajya - paudgalika hawulkarithwaya (ridi bandi ala gowi samagam aakruthiya aashritha agayim), ‚Äòshri lankawe gramiya kuda wawwala wikashanaya, sthanagatha kirima, wyapthiya ha eewayin ituwana athyawashya ma sewa yana paryeshana adhyayanayan hi soya ganim ha anawaranayan merata wathman nayakathwaye awashyathawaya ha aayathanaye dayakathwaya ekthan kala awasthawan kihipayak pamani.apa aayathanaye dakma gowijana anshaya pamanak ma nowa gramiya anshaye da thirasara sanwardhanaya udesa nawa danuma jananaya kara beda harima yi.wagawata idamjathika idam prathipaththiyak sakasana mahinda chinthanaya mahawali yojana kramawala gowi janapada gowinta idam labadimath, gowi bimwala sinnakkara ayithiya thahawuru kirimath aramunu kota atha.
